sentences.en: Always refuel your generator outside away from any source of ignition.
sentences.cn: 加油你永远远离任何外来发电机着火源.

sentences.en: Do you need ( want ) to refuel after landing?
sentences.cn: 降落后你需要加油 吗 ?

sentences.en: His plane stopped in France to refuel.
sentences.cn: 他的飞机经停法国续加燃油。

sentences.en: His plane stopped in Hawaii to refuel.
sentences.cn: 他的飞机在夏威夷停下来加燃料。

sentences.en: His plane stopped to refuel in Geneva.
sentences.cn: 他的飞机在日内瓦停降加油.

sentences.en: I need to refuel my belly with some tasty yumminess.
sentences.cn: 我需要用美味佳肴来填充我的胃.

sentences.en: So, join us to refuel with the struggle.
sentences.cn: 所以我们一起加油, 一起奋斗.

sentences.en: The bus made a stop to refuel.
The day disaster against. the firemen. refuel!
sentences.cn: 天灾难防. 消防队员们. 加油啊!

sentences.en: The driver stopped the car at the petrol station to refuel.
sentences.cn: 司机将汽车停在加油站加油.

sentences.en: The midheaven axis gear reduction electrically operated actuation, does not need to refuel the province space.
sentences.cn: 中空轴型齿轮减速电动驱动, 无需加油省空间.

sentences.en: The others stand by to cover , when these planes land to refuel and rearm.
sentences.cn: 这批飞机下来加油、补充弹药的时候,另有一批在旁掩护.

sentences.en: The plane was refuelled in Dubai.

trans.tran_en: to fill a plane or vehicle with  fuel  before continuing a journey
